Some popular vegetarian options in Hanoi include:

* Pho (noodle soup with vegetables and herbs)
* Banh mi (a sandwich made with pickled vegetables, herbs, and sometimes tofu or tempeh)
* Com Tam (broken rice with grilled pork, egg, and various toppings)
